headline: Vita Coco Soars After Getting A Major Tariff Exemption
summary: Shares of the coconut water brand Vita Coco (COCO) soared Monday on the news it would be eligible for the latest round of exemptions from President Donald Trump's tariffs. Vita Coco stock leaped more than 10% when the market opened. Late on Friday evening, Trump signed an executive order that removed tariffs on agricultural products that can't be grown in...

headline: JPMorgan sees major EPS tailwinds for these food producers from new tariff relief
summary: Investing.com -- JPMorgan says newly announced tariff exemptions from the White House could deliver meaningful earnings upside for several major U.S. food producers, with Hershey, Smucker and McCormick positioned to benefit the most.

raw.headline: JPMorgan sees major EPS tailwinds for these food producers from new tariff relief

headline: Hershey (HSY) Is Up 6.1% After Securing Key Cocoa Tariff Exemption - What's Changed
summary: Hershey recently secured a tariff exemption on cocoa imports, effective from November 13, 2025, potentially lowering its quarterly import expenses by around US$50 million and improving its cost structure. This policy change stands out for its direct and substantial effect on ingredient costs, a critical consideration given cocoa’s importance to Hershey’s products and profitability. We'll explore how this cost-saving tariff exemption could reshape Hershey’s investment narrative by altering...
